metadata.title: CVE-2024-46724 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: Fix out-of-bounds read of df_v1_7_channel_numberCheck the fb_channel_number range to avoid the array out-of-boundsread error

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-50.51').
